question: Assalam O Allaecum A book containing only Most Authentic Ahadith (Saheeh Ahadith) From 6 Most reliable Ahadith Books.
answer:
QUESTION
I am intrusted to know is there any book containing collection of only most authentic (Saheh Ahadith) from 6 Most Reliable Ahadith (Saheh Bokhari, Saheh Muslim etc)Books.
ANSWER


Share:
Mishkaatul Masaabih is a compilation of Ahaadith from Sihaah-e-Sittah (six
authentic books of Hadith) as well as from other reliable sources.

Mishkaat is translated in English and is available in the Kutub Khaanas in
Pakistan.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
